thread.title: Drake’s Offer to Help Talk Suicidal Man Off Bridge Declined, Police Say
thread.title_full: Drake’s Offer to Help Talk Suicidal Man Off Bridge Declined, Police Say

author: Noah Yoo
title: Drake’s Offer to Help Talk Suicidal Man Off Bridge Declined, Police Say
text:
Drake’s Offer to Help Talk Suicidal Man Off Bridge Declined, Police Say The rapper’s tour bus was caught up in traffic due to the incident Drake Photo by Harmony Gerber/Getty Images 
Drake offered to talk down a suicidal man who was standing on the wrong side of a bridge barrier in Manchester, England, Manchester Evening News reports. According to police reports, Drake’s bus was caught up in the traffic that was caused by police blocking off roads surrounding the bridge. “One officer was approached by a male from a tour van caught up in the traffic congestion, claiming to be part of Drake’s entourage,” said Inspector Phil Spurgeon. “He offered for Drake to speak to the male on the bridge, if that would help. The offer was declined with thanks.” Although Drake’s help wasn’t accepted, the story has a happy ending— Manchester Evening News reports that the man was eventually safely escorted off the bridge, and taken to hospital for treatment. Drake is currently in Europe for the Boy Meets World Tour . Artists In This Story
